text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump I know Dr. Birx is a scientist, but how did she happen to pick the countries she picked to compare with USA deaths?

USA's deaths/million are almost 3 TIMES those in the 7 countries below when their data is combined.

Data from https://t.co/hCTuKKryXt, April 16. 
#COVID https://t.co/nRFFOljiDo
